template.name: Avocent PM3000 SNMPv2 - Chained PDU
template.description: This is a chained PDU attached to an Avocent PM3000. You can clone this template and attach multiple of it, and adjust the macro as needed.

trigger.name: PDU Voltage out of range on {HOST.NAME} PDU#{$PDUID} = {ITEM.VALUE}

trigger_prototype.name: PDU Outlet {#OUTLET_NAME} on {#OUTLET_PDU} is in state {ITEM.VALUE}
